info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 1:18PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Meade, southeastern Lawrence and west central Pennington Counties through 145 PM MDT... At 117 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles south of Nemo to near Mystic. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Pactola Reservoir around 125 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Black Hawk and Johnson Siding. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota near Mile Marker 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms are producing large quantities of hail. Driving through deep hail is like driving on slushy roads. Slow down and do not brake suddenly. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for west central South Dakota.
